text: allahu parannatearkkuka: isa, nan ninne ‎purnamayi erretukkum. ninne ennilekk ‎uyarttum. satyanisedhikalil ninn atarttiyetutt ‎ninne nam visud'dhanakkum. ninne pinparriyavare ‎uyirttelunnelpunalvare satyanisedhikalekkal ‎unnatarakkum. pinne ninnaluteyeakke tiriccuvarav ‎enre atuttekkan. ninnal bhinniccirunna ‎karyannalil appeal nan tirppu kalpikkum. ‎
